movie.title: They Died with Their Boots On
movie.plot: The story follows General George Armstrong Custer's adventures from his West Point days to his death. He defies orders during the Civil War, trains the 7th Cavalry, appeases Chief Crazy Horse and later engages in bloody battle with the Sioux nation.

events.title: George Armstrong Custer enters West Point as a cadet
General Custer dies at the Battle of Little Bighorn
